resources.string: The player who will move first is randomly determined. In the game, you can notice 3 objects: the playing field of the first player, the playing field of the second player and the status bar.

If the opponent has dices with the value of X in the cells on the same vertical and you put the dice with the value of X on the same vertical in your cell, then the opponent\'s dices are removed. Similar rules apply to the opponent. The game ends when one of the players occupies all the cells of his field. The winner is the player who scored the most points after the end of the game.
